Inputs

- View sections (Cold) and player state context.

Preconditions

- `view.export.result` received; Cold + player_safe=true; snapshot present.

Process

1. Narrate section text in agreed register; maintain pace and rhythm.
2. Present choices clearly; avoid meta; keep contrast sharp.
3. Enforce gateways with diegetic phrasing; branch safely on failure.
4. During dry-run, log issues for `pn.playtest.submit`.

Outputs

- Player-safe narration lines (runtime); optional `pn.playtest.submit` later.
